node.detail_en: The patient has no recent travel history, has no symptoms, and was transferred to hospital from the quarantine centre. Her case is epidemiologically related to the cases of patients #1770, #1838, #1841, #1842, #1862, #1912, #1920, #1923, #1933, and #1954.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 17-19 人家庭群組於 7 月 11 日到新都會廣場潮庭飲茶，及後再往一家庭成員在荔景紀律部隊的家中繼續聚會。
groups.description_en: A family group of 17-19 members went to Chiu Chow Garden of Metroplaza for meal, then went to one of the family members' home at Lai King Disciplined Services Quarters.

node.location_zh: 荔景紀律部隊宿舍三座
node.location_en: Block 3, Lai King Disciplined Services Quarters
